title: ECX Finale 2021 - Moving Forward
description: ECX Finale 2021 brings together people who shape the future of Work for 3 days of sessions, workshops and networking. Described by many as 'Moving Forward', our team creates a Conference where we all can meet up for inspiration and experience sharing.
keywords: event, GrandFinale, ECX, ECX Conference, Moving Forward , programming, UNILAG, ULES
